statements: SELECT * FROM theater_performance;
SELECT performance_title, performance_date FROM theater_performance;
SELECT * FROM theater_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT performance_title, box_office_numbers FROM theater_performance WHERE attendance_records > 100;
SELECT performance_id, performance_title, attendance_records FROM theater_performance ORDER BY attendance_records DESC;
SELECT performance_title, box_office_numbers, attendance_records FROM theater_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC, box_office_numbers ASC
SELECT performance_title, attendance_records FROM theater_performance WHERE box_office_numbers > 1000 ORDER BY performance_title ASC
SELECT performance_title, performance_date, attendance_records FROM theater_performance WHERE attendance_records < 500 ORDER BY attendance_records DESC, performance_title ASC
SELECT * FROM theater_performance WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND attendance_records BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY performance_date ASC
SELECT performance_title, box_office_numbers FROM theater_performance WHERE performance_title LIKE '%Night%' AND attendance_records > 200 ORDER BY box_office_numbers DESC
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT performance_name, performance_date FROM performances WHERE performance_id = 2;
SELECT actor_name, age FROM actors WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM performances ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT performance_name, attendance_records FROM performances WHERE box_office_number > 1000;
SELECT performance_name, performance_date FROM performances WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT actor_name, performance_name FROM actors JOIN performances ON actors.performance_id = performances.performance_id
SELECT performance_name, box_office_number, attendance_records FROM performances WHERE box_office_number > 1000 ORDER BY attendance_records DESC
SELECT actor_name, age, performance_name FROM actors JOIN performances ON actors.performance_id = performances.performance_id WHERE performance_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT performance_name, box_office_numbers FROM performances WHERE attendance_records > 100;
SELECT * FROM theaters ORDER BY location ASC, total_seats DESC;
SELECT performance_name, performance_date FROM performances WHERE performance_id = 5;
SELECT theater_name, location, total_seats FROM theaters WHERE total_seats >= 500;
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT performance_name, attendance_records FROM performances WHERE box_office_numbers > 5000 ORDER BY box_office_numbers DESC;
SELECT theater_name, location, total_seats FROM theaters WHERE total_seats < 1000;
SELECT performance_name, ticket_price FROM performances INNER JOIN tickets ON performances.performance_id = tickets.performance_id WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;

SELECT theater_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM theaters LEFT JOIN performances ON theaters.theater_id = performances.performance_id LEFT JOIN tickets ON performances.performance_id = tickets.performance_id GROUP BY theater_name ORDER BY total_tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT performance_id, performance_title FROM Performances;
SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT theater_name, location FROM Theaters ORDER BY theater_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, date_of_birth FROM Actors WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT attendance_id, audience_name, ticket_price FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Performances WHERE performance_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT performance_title, box_office_numbers FROM Performances WHERE performance_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Actors WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT theater_name, location FROM Theaters WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY theater_name ASC;
SELECT a.actor_name, p.performance_title, ar.audience_name FROM Actors a JOIN Performances p ON a.actor_id = p.performance_id JOIN AttendanceRecords ar ON p.performance_id = ar.performance_id;
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT performance_name, performance_date FROM performances;
SELECT director_name, years_of_experience FROM directors;
SELECT actor_name, nationality FROM actors WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT ticket_number, price, ticket_type FROM tickets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE attendance_records > 1000 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, performance_name, box_office_numbers FROM performances WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND performance_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT director_name, style FROM directors WHERE years_of_experience > 10 ORDER BY director_name ASC;
SELECT actor_name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM actors WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY actor_name;
SELECT theater_name, location, seating_capacity FROM theaters ORDER BY seating_capacity DESC;
